description:
We will guide you through the process of discovering your unique message, the tools to be found through the youtube search engine and the ability to create a killer channel. This course is jargon free and full of examples. The course should be taken at your own pace. One lesson a day will take the student about a month to complete.

The course is divided into three main sections: Message, search, and channel.

This course is unique because no other has the message at its core. Other courses can tell you how to be found but none besides this course give you the why people will tune in which is critical to all success on youtubers.
title: How to become a youtube rockstar
